span.p: Students with broken or malfunctioning devices may exchange them at the Mitchell High School main entrance foyer. Read more for program hours and further information.

span.p: Click here to reserve a meal kit for your MCS student. MCS can provide MCS students with a 5 day meal kit once a week during the extended school outage. Pick up dates and times will be April 7th, 14th, 21st, and 28th from 10 AM - 12 PM at the MHS front entrance.
